com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.properties
Interface PropertyChangeListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
GeneralSettings, MockBall, MockButton, MockCanvas, MockCheckBox, MockComponent, MockContactPicker, MockContainer, MockEmailPicker, MockForm, MockHorizontalArrangement, MockImage, MockImagePicker, MockImageSprite, MockLabel, MockListPicker, MockNonVisibleComponent, MockPasswordTextBox, MockPhoneNumberPicker, MockRadioButton, MockTableArrangement, MockTextBox, MockVerticalArrangement, MockVideoPlayer, MockVisibleComponent, MockWebViewer, Settings, YoungAndroidSettings, YoungAndroidSettings
public interface PropertyChangeListener

Listener interface for receiving property value change events.

Classes interested in processing property value change events implement this interface, and instances of that class are registered with the EditableProperties in which that class is interested, using EditableProperties.addPropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener) method. When the property value change event occurs, the listeners' onPropertyChange() methods are invoked.

Method Summary
 void onPropertyChange(String name, String newValue)
          Invoked after the value of a property was changed.
